sentences.english: Sherbet lemons are hard candies filled with dry sherbet powder.
sentences.chinese: 柠檬果子露其实就是中心填了这种干果子露粉的硬糖。

sentences.english: Who doesn’t love sucking on a nice piece of hard candy? Well, why not make your very own at home!
sentences.chinese: 谁不喜欢吃一枚漂亮的硬糖呢？

sentences.english: The bowl contains assorted hard sweets.
In still higher concentrations it crystallizes and adds brittleness as in hard candies.
sentences.chinese: 在浓度更高时可产生结晶，增加体系脆性，比如硬糖。

sentences.english: You can also chew sugarle gum or suck on sugarle hard candy to help stimulate saliva production.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以嚼无糖口香糖或含无糖硬糖来促进唾液分泌。

sentences.english: You can also chew sugarless gum or suck on sugarless hard candy to help stimulate saliva production.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以嚼无糖口香糖或含无糖硬糖来促进唾液分泌。

sentences.english: They are hard lemon candies, rather sour, dusted with sugar.
sentences.chinese: 柠檬硬糖是一种柠檬味道的水果糖，相当酸，外面。

sentences.english: 18Second Lieutenant Andrew Ferrara, with the 27th Infantry Regiment, packs Gobstopper candy with the rest of his arsenal
sentences.chinese: 第27步兵团少尉安德鲁费拉拉兜里还塞有硬糖。

definition: soft candy (gummi candy, gumdrop, jellybean etc)
to fill with stuffing (e.g. in cooking)/stuffed
